replies.bodyText: Ups. Let's see if this is short enough. (I could not reproduce the error by running the checkstyle task locally, though.)
replies.author: johnjohndoe

replies.bodyText: Yeah, the checkstyle gradle task only checks the things that AntennaPod already fulfills. We use diff-checkstyle on CI to gradually enforce more rules while still not doing a huge "reformatted everything" PR that messes up merges and git history. Diff-checkstyle uses the checkstyle-new-code.xml config file that can be imported in Android Studio.
replies.author: ByteHamster

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the explanation. I wasn't aware of diff-checkstyle.
